column4: good evening; Xserver is giving me an error because my graphics card is not supported
ATI X850
but this time, it doesn't
so I am not sure how I can configure my network adapter and download the ati xorgconf
ATI X850
I have answered the question :)
can someone please tell me how to get terminal up after xserver crashes
thank you; can someone please tell me how to configure a network in terminal? (setting the IP address, default gateway, subnet mask, and DNS server)
will a network adapter auto configure itself if DHCP is turned on?
should
how would I configure it manually? setting the IP, default gateway, subnet, and DNS server
is it wlan0 or eth0
eth0
are you wired or wireless
wired
but DHCP is turned up
it is a wireless router but my PC is connected via wire to it
let me look up a command really quick
try "ifconfig eth0 down" then "ifconfig eth0 up"  to see if itll wake up
not sure if this command would work too "ifconfig eth0 -dynamic"  as in dynamic ip but its worth a try
last time, there was a command to edit a file where I put in the DNS servers
right, that one i dont know where it is
maybe the configuration editor will point you to that, Im looking to see if the ethernet settings are there
